name: 45rpm Adapter Christmas Cards
description: A5 Christmas cards with Factoryroad's own 45rpm adapters attached! The archetypal 'stocking filler' or pressie for the audiophile and record collector. Choose from King of Christmas (our new design for 2013, by illustrator Graham Robson) Bauble, Christmas Tree or Snowman (with hand-finished faces!) Supplied with sturdy turquoise C5 envelope and individually wrapped in cellophane, sent in a brown board envelope for robust protection. (Please note colours may vary slightly from those shown on your screen!)

name: 45rpm Record Adapter - Retail Packs of 18
description: We would encourage you to buy from one of our stockists, but if you don't have one near you, our 'dinks' are available in little clear boxes of 18, designed for our retail market (to sit and stack comfortably on shelves or counter tops). Currently available in 8 colours: Red / blue / yellow / green / white / black / silver / pink Orders can be for any combination of colours, with no minimum order. For orders of 10 or above, please get in touch as we may be able to arrange a lower delivery cost). Please note though postage costs are high on these as they are an awkward shape when posted one or two at a time. The little boxes ARE very cute though! "Thanks for redesigning and continuing to manufacture such an essential piece of vinyl culture!!! I can not thank you guys enough for saving me from those crappy little yellow pieces of plastic I have been using up till now." - Hasan Sidiq, California Questions? Email Leigh: info@factoryroad.net UK / £5 + £2.50 postage (covers 1-10 packs) EVERYWHERE ELSE / £5.00 + £5.00 postage (covers 1-10 packs) • BESPOKE and CUSTOM orders: Factoryroad adapters can be personalised with your company, band, DJ or label name, and can also be produced in off-the-shelf or bespoke colours, subject to a minimum order. If you have a project in mind, get in touch on 01455 632819, info@factoryroad.net, and ask for Leigh or Sarah.

name: 45rpm Record Adapter - Individual Pack of 9
description: Factoryroad come from a background of pirate radio, music and art, and have long collected these curious and somehow never-out-of-favour iconic plastic shapes.  They’re odd, but they’re a shape strangely recognised the world over, by all ages. Currently available in 8 colours: Red / blue / yellow / green / white / black / silver / pink After months of meeting demand for these little record adapters by supplying boring yellow ones - the only ones we could find, new ‘old’ stock imported from the US - we decided to make our own. Years of work later, these things are sturdier, re-designed, refined, with better grip, superior material and produced in a range of colours. In fact, we can make them in virtually any colour, right here in the UK. "Thanks for redesigning and continuing to manufacture such an essential piece of vinyl culture!!! I can not thank you guys enough for saving me from those crappy little yellow pieces of plastic I have been using up till now." - Hasan Sidiq, California Designed and made in England. Price per pack, with second class postage included: UK / £3.00 (second class postage included) EVERYWHERE ELSE / £3.00 + £3.00 postage DISTRIBUTION and WHOLESALE Our dinks are distributed internationally by the supremely efficient ST Holdings You can buy a Retail Box of 18 - also here in the shop. • BESPOKE and CUSTOM orders: Factoryroad adapters can be personalised with your company, band, DJ or label name, and can also be produced in off-the-shelf or bespoke colours, subject to a minimum order. If you have a project in mind, get in touch on 01455 632819, info@factoryroad.net, and ask for Leigh or Sarah.

options.name: Mix of colours - please state when you order, thank you!

name: 45rpm Record Adapter - Bulk Bags / bags of 100 / 15p per adapter
description: Our dinks are available to buy in bulk without packaging, for orders of 100+. Delivery within the UK: £8.00 If you're outside the UK, please get in touch to get a quote on delivery of your chosen amount to your location. Currently available in 8 colours: Red (currently out of stock) / blue / yellow / green / white / black / silver / pink Bags of 100 can be composed of different colours - please choose 'Mixed' from the menu and let us know how you'd like your bag divided, for example 50 green, 25 yellow, 25 white. 0.15p per unit / sold in 100s Questions? Email Leigh "Thanks for redesigning and continuing to manufacture such an essential piece of vinyl culture! I cannot thank you guys enough for saving me from those crappy little yellow pieces of plastic I have been using up till now." - Hasan Sidiq, California • BESPOKE and CUSTOM orders: Factoryroad adapters can be personalised with your company, band, DJ or label name, and can also be produced in off-the-shelf or bespoke colours, subject to a minimum order. If you have a project in mind, get in touch on 01455 632819, info@factoryroad.net, and ask for Leigh or Sarah.

name: 45rpm Record Adapter - Bulk Bags / bags of 1000 / 12p per adapter
description: Our dinks are available to buy in bulk without packaging, for orders of 1000 and over. 0.12p per unit, packed in bags of 1000. Currently available in 8 colours: Blue / yellow / green / white / black / silver / pink (please note we are currently out of stock of red) Bags of 1000 can be composed of different colours - please choose 'Mixed' from the menu and let us know how you'd like your bag divided, for example 500 green, 250 yellow, 200 white, 50 silver. Delivery within the UK: 1000+ adapters (1.5kg) = £8.00 Delivery outside the UK: Please ask us for a price on delivery to your area with your desired quantity. Prices include VAT (which will be detailed on your invoice). Please get in touch to get a quote on delivery to your area before ordering, and to check we have enough of your colour - depending on stock levels your order might take slightly longer to get to you. Questions? Email Leigh "Thanks for redesigning and continuing to manufacture such an essential piece of vinyl culture! name: Inkymole '45rpm' Print
description:
The iconic shape rendered in Mole's detailed hand. Suits a square frame, so comes on an A3 sheet for cropping or rotation as you prefer. 

POSTAGE & PACKING: 

29.7 x 42cm (A3) print on 315gsm cotton, lignin/acid-free Hahnemuhle paper, sent in protective sleeve, and each one's signed.

POSTAGE & PACKING: 
UK £6.75 (Royal Mail, 1st class Signed For) 
Europe / Rest of the world £10.00 (International Signed For, small packet rate) 
Costs are the same even if you order more than one print.

Please allow a day or two for us to get it posted to you! 
(Cost of print includes VAT)

Shakespeare's cheeky quote from Much Ado, hand-drawn in ink! 

29.7 x 42cm (A3) print on 315gsm cotton, lignin/acid-free Hahnemuhle paper, sent in protective sleeve, and each one's signed.

description:
Created originally for a poster campaign for the RHS, this springtime illustration was created with inks on paper, without any digital trickery. The print you'll receive is just a fraction smaller than the original artwork, and can be viewed or hung any way up.

29.7 x 42cm (A3) print on 315gsm cotton, lignin/acid-free Hahnemuhle paper, sent in protective sleeve, and each one's signed.

name: Graham Robson 'Mole' Print
description:
Created for 'The Wind In The Willows', this is the most determined and prepared Mole you are ever likely to meet, by new illustrator Graham Robson. 

Currently working in the Inkymole studio, it was this charming observation of our favourite mammal that warmed us to his way of looking at the world: grahamrobson.com

29.7 x 42cm (A3) print on 315gsm cotton, lignin/acid-free Hahnemuhle paper, sent in protective sleeve, and each one's signed.

name: Inkymole / 'To Kill A Mockingbird' Print
description:
Since creating the cover for the 50th Anniversary Edition of this historic book in 2009, I've been asked for many copies of the artwork in print form, from fans of the book all over the world.

I've added it to the print collection here so that you can now buy one without having to email and ask first!

29.7 x 42cm (A3) print on 315gsm cotton, lignin/acid-free Hahnemuhle paper, sent in protective sleeve, and each one's signed.

POSTAGE & PACKING: 
UK £6.75 (Royal Mail, 1st class Signed For)

Please allow a day or two for us to get it posted to you! 
(Cost of print includes VAT)

name: Inkymole / 'I LOVE CHIPS' print
description:
This is a little one with a big message - an A5 print which would fit greasily into your kitchen or pantry.

Created originally for Mole's birthday party, this little bit of it's gone all shy as a result of being a surprise hit with other chip lovers. Comes with a little white border for framing. 

Unlimited edition, all signed with a chewed pen nicked from the caff.

Postage on this is cheaper as it is silly to have postage costing over half what the print costs!

POSTAGE & PACKING: 
UK £2.00 (regular post)
Europe / Rest of the world £4.00 (regular post)

Costs are the same even if you order more than one print.

Please allow a few days for us to get it posted to you!
(Total cost of print + postage includes VAT.)

description:

Orange or Navy. 

Available in S, M and L.

Get the mate-rate while you can of just £15!

Postage: 
Choose 'United Kingdom' if you're collecting from us (free).
Choose 'Everywhere Else' (£1) if we're posting to you.

name: Graham Robson hand-built sketchbook
description: A home-bound sketchbook with delightful illustrated endpapers Birmingham Institute of Art and Design graduate and illustrator Graham Robson. Measuring 15.5cm x 11cm x 14mm deep, they contain robust sketching paper and open out wide for easy colouring-in. A delightful addition to our range of books - to which we will be adding more over the next couple of months! And watch out for Graham - his crayons will be populating magazines and books near you very soon. POSTAGE UK packet post: £1.50 (1 book) / £2.70 2+ books Everywhere else: £5.00 1+ books

name: Inkymole / Sage Francis handmade 'Personal Journal' double sided notebook
description: Inkymole celebrates the anniversary of a period of immense change and creativity inspired by Sage Francis, with this brand new 'Personal Journal' based on the original double-sided version originally released in 2006. If you've followed Inkymole's work you'll know just how pivotal the body of work created for her 2006 show was. The release of Sage Francis' 'Personal Journals', the anniversary of Inkymole's show 'If A Girl Writes off the World', along with its two US incarnations in Manhattan and Rhode Island are all celebrated with this limited edition, hand-made book with one side for writing (Thoughts) and one for sketching (Ideas). Measuring 102mm x 146mm - fitting most pockets - each side is 7mm thick and interspersed with removable, perforated mailable postcards showing unseen artwork from the original show, 8 postcards in total. The covers are hand-embossed in gold or silver foil with a close-up section of Mole's 'Runaways' illustration, and come in a range of colours, from silver to pearl white to maroon to iridescent pink. Signed by Inkymole, these are released at the same time as two new prints, much-requested but not available at the time of the show, of 'Hopeless' by Inkymole, and 'Runaways', also in the Inkymole shop. All prices include VAT. DELIVERY UK: £2.20 covers delivery of up to 3 books by Royal Mail Second Class Post Europe: £5.00 covers delivery of up to three books by Royal Mail international post USA: We can ship to the US, but we recommend you visit Sage's site to buy one which can be shipped directly to you: http://www.strangefamousrecords.com/news/personaljournalsnotebooks

name: Tea Towel: Factoryroad Gallery Richard Hogg Tea Towel
description:
A 260gsm screen printed tea towel, hand-pulled right here in Factory Road and designed by world-renowned illustrator and games-inventor Richard Hogg for his show at the Factoryroad Gallery, October 2011.

In turquoise and measuring 50cm x 70cm, it'll be drying that stack of dishes well into old age.

Limited to 30.

www.h099.com
www.factoryroadgallery.net


POSTAGE & PACKING: 
UK £2 UK / £2 elsewhere
(Total cost of towel + postage includes VAT.)

name: Tea Towel: Secret Members' Show tea towel
description:
This 260gsm 100% cotton tea towel, hand-screened right here in Factory Road, was produced for The Secret Members' Show, September 2011. The illustration is by Carl Rosati of The Cloud Commission. Limited to 50 only in the world ever.

Fill in your own cockversation!

Postage £2 UK / £2 everywhere else.
(Total cost of print + postage includes VAT.)

name: Tea Towel: DJ Food/Henry Flint 'Helmet Polishing Cloth'
description:
As is the custom here at Factoryroad, our 'house-that-got-turned-into-a-gallery', each time we have a show we produce that most domestic of items, a souvenir tea towel. 

Only this one has slightly different qualities in that it can, of course, be used to polish your space helmet, visor or instrument panel, as well as being an excellent tool for removing excess water from recently-washed dishes.

Printed in chocolate brown and coppery gold, it bears the date of the show and comes wrapped in a band showing a monochrome Skullstronaut. Screen printed in Factory Road and hand-sewn.

Sticker and Ninja tattoo with every purchase (while stocks last!)

Delivery £1.00 within the UK (includes a jiffy and postage), £2.00 everywhere else.

name: Peter Horridge Limited Edition print: (3 only): 'Tonight, Poets'
description:
We are honoured to have for sale these pieces by one of Inkymole's inspirations and peers, calligrapher and artist Peter Horridge, co-founder of Central Illustration Agency and breathtakingly skilled pensmith.

Created specially for Factoryroad Gallery's 'Gentleman Practice' show, work inspired by the words of Buddy Wakefield.

He's made just three of these iPad paintings- the fourth is framed - at £50 each - on German Hahnemuehle 315gsm etching paper, size A2. They're signed...and beautiful.

Each comes with an A3 'Crowbirds & Mockingbars' print designed by Brook Valentine.

UK delivery: £6.50 (Special Delivery, signed-for)
Elsewhere: £10  (normal post)

Comes rolled securely in a tube.

name: Inkymole 'If A Girl Writes Off The World' Exhibition Book
description:
This was the booklet produced to accompany Inkymole's 'If A Girl Writes Off The World' shows in London, New York and Providence in 2006/7.

It contains hand-drawn and typed background to each piece of art work, including full lyrics by Sage Francis, in an extravagantly-doodled exercise-book format. There are now only a few of these left.

Choose Blue, Green Pink, Yellow or Orange.

name: Ed Garland / 'Taken In And Done For', paperback + free 'Snowtrees' print
description:
Our friend and long-term collaborator Ed Garland has published his first book. It's been percolating for some time, but if you've seen Inkymole's Snowtrees print, her Pendle Witches, or those springtime tote bags, or been to any one of several Factoryroad exhibitions, you'll have met Ed's words before. 
He's been part of the gang for so many years we fail to remember how it all came about, but his writing has enriched our processes immeasurably.

Quoth he:
'I've been poking it with a stick for ages and today it finally asked me to leave it alone. A pungent glut of whimsical despair. A king-size bag of peculiar crisps. A lot of blank space and very little action. A series of one-day jobs.
One page of it was adapted from a bit of [my] blog, so I owe you 10p if you feel like that's cheating, but it's woven niftily into the rest of the story, a story so incredibly adequate that after it's over you'll think it was almost worth bothering with.'

£7 inc. postage from Factoryroad, within the UK.
Add £2 for delivery anywhere outside the UK.

Sent with a Snowtrees print, while stock lasts!
